description.summary: This cluster comprises senior-level marketing professionals who lead strategic initiatives, oversee marketing communications, and drive brand growth. They possess a strong background in marketing strategy, communications planning, and have a proven track record of managing cross-functional teams to achieve business objectives.
description.typicalBackground: Professionals with extensive experience in marketing roles, often holding titles such as Vice President, Director, or Group Creative Director. They typically have backgrounds in strategic marketing, communications, and have progressed to senior leadership positions overseeing large teams and significant budgets.

matchReasons: Leadership role in project management and marketing operations
Senior role managing brand initiatives and digital strategies
Executive role overseeing marketing and communications
Skills: Integrated Marketing, Communications Planning, B2B Marketing
Senior marketing and communications leadership role

description.summary: This cluster includes professionals dedicated to planning, producing, and managing events. They coordinate various aspects of event execution, from logistics and vendor management to on-site operations and client relations. Their expertise ensures the successful delivery of events that meet client objectives and provide memorable experiences.
description.typicalBackground: Individuals with experience in event management roles, such as Producer, Event Manager, or Production Coordinator. They often have backgrounds in hospitality, marketing, or production, and have progressed to managing large-scale events and leading production teams.

matchReasons: Title: Director of Public Relations, Communications and Investor Relations
Role involves managing internal and external communications for events
Leadership role in creative and event production
Extensive experience in producing and managing events
Role involves organizing and executing various events
Experience in producing and managing large-scale events

description.summary: Professionals in this cluster focus on the creative aspects of marketing and event production. They lead creative teams, oversee branding and design projects, and ensure that visual elements align with strategic goals. Their role is pivotal in developing compelling visual narratives and innovative designs that enhance brand identity and event experiences.
description.typicalBackground: Individuals with backgrounds in graphic design, art direction, or creative leadership roles, often holding titles such as Creative Director, Group Creative Director, or Designer. They typically have experience in managing design teams and leading creative projects for brands and events.

matchReasons: Skills: Management, Operations Management, Creative Problem Solving
Role involves creative production and management of events
Role combines creative direction with experiential marketing
Skills: Creative Branding, Art Direction, Retail Design
Executive role overseeing creative strategies and design projects
Title: Head of Experiential and Production
Skills: Creative Problem Solving, Experiential Marketing
Leadership role in creative and experiential event production
Involvement in brand and creative marketing strategies

description.summary: This cluster includes mid-level professionals who coordinate and support marketing and production activities. They handle various operational tasks, manage schedules, liaise with vendors, and ensure that marketing initiatives and production projects run smoothly. Their role is essential in bridging the gap between strategic planning and execution.
description.typicalBackground: Professionals with experience in marketing or production coordination roles, often holding titles such as Marketing Coordinator, Production Coordinator, or Account Coordinator. They typically have a background in marketing, communications, or event management and excel in managing day-to-day operations.

matchReasons: Role involves coordinating and managing production activities
Role involves coordinating marketing and field activities
Role involves coordinating marketing communications and projects
Role involves coordinating marketing initiatives and social media strategies
Role involves coordinating production and managing event logistics
